coms309.songusoid

Class LilBigSong

  • java.lang.Object
    • coms309.songusoid.LilBigSong

  • public class LilBigSong
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Garrett on 10/21/2017. Helper class to store information for the lil Big Song algorithm song creation
